rukus.text: Niscaya tomadera pratipalaka allaha. Tini nabhomandala o bhumandalake chaya dine srsti karechena. Atahpara arasera upara adhistita hayechena. Tini pariye dena ratera upara dinake ematabasthaya ye, dina daure ratera pichane ase. Tini srsti karechena surya, candra o naksatra daura sbiya adesera anugami. Sune rekha, tamra'i kaja srsti kara ebam adesa dana kara. Allaha, barakatamaya yini bisbajagatera pratipalaka.
Tomara sbiya pratipalakake daka, kakuti-minati kare ebam sangopane. Tini sima atikramakariderake pachanda karena na.
Prthibike kusanskaramukta o thika karara para tate anartha srsti karo na. Tamke ahabana kara bhaya o asa sahakare. Niscaya allahara karuna satkarmasiladera nikatabarti.

Tini'i brstira purbe susambadabahi bayu pathiye dena. Emanaki yakhana bayurasi panipurna meghamala baye ane, takhana ami e meghamalake ekati mrta saharera dike hamîyakiye de'i. Atahpara e megha theke brsti dhara barsana kari. Atahpara pani dbara saba rakamera phala utpanna kari. Emani bhabe mrtaderake bera karaba-yate tomara cinta kara.

Ye sahara utkrsta, tara phasala tara pratipalakera nirdese utpanna haya ebam ya nikrsta tate alpa'i phasala utpanna haya. Emanibhabe ami ayatasamuha ghuriye phiriye barnana kari krtajna sampradayera jan'ye.
